character.age: 2500 years, yet appears to be 25 in human years due to Eldridian aging process
character.role: Main Protagonist and Seeker of Ancient Knowledge
character.background: Asteria was born on the celestial island of Elyria, where she discovered her innate connection to the cosmos and developed her magical abilities. She has spent centuries exploring the galaxy in search of answers about her people's forgotten past.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Silver-blonde, often worn in a long braid adorned with tiny star-shaped gemstones
